thread.title: Ineos Agrees to Buy DEA’s North Sea Gas Fields
thread.title_full: Ineos Agrees to Buy DEA’s North Sea Gas Fields - WSJ

author: Selina Williams
title: Ineos Agrees to Buy DEA’s North Sea Gas Fields
text:
LONDON—Swiss petrochemicals company Ineos said Sunday that it has agreed to acquire all the U.K. North Sea gas fields owned by DEA, the oil and gas company owned by Russian billionaire Mikhail Fridman’s LetterOne investment fund.
A spokesman for LetterOne confirmed the deal. But neither company gave a value for the sale.
